*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *15 bitter *0 sour }} '''Aguav''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of bitter and less than 5 points of all other flavours.
